titleStmt.title: The sermons of Maister Henrie Smith gathered into one volume. Printed according to his corrected copies in his life time.
Sermons
titleStmt.author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Field [, T. Orwin, and R. Robinson] for Thomas Man, dwelling in Pater Noster row, at the signe of the Talbot,

notesStmt.note: "Orwin pr[inted]. Aa-Zz and Nnn-Bbbb; Robinson pr[inted]. Aaa-Mmm; Field did the rest"--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
